directions.step: To make the cajeta, place the milk, sugar and cinnamon bark in a large pot and bring to a simmer, stirring frequently.

Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the baking soda-water mixture. Wait briefly for the bubbles to disappear, then return the pan to the heat and bring to a simmer. Simmer on medium-high stirring frequently for an hour or until the mixture turns a golden brown colour.

After an hour, continue to simmer the mixture, watching carefully as it begins to thicken. Simmer until the mixture darkens further and is thick and syrupy - this will take a further 15-20 minutes. Remove from the heat and set aside to cool slightly before serving.

ingredient.name: baking soda
ingredient.preparation: dissolved in a splash of water
